title: The Divine Gift
text: The Divine Gift is a 1918 British <a href="silent%20film">silent</a> <a href="drama%20film">drama film</a> directed by <a href="Thomas%20Bentley">Thomas Bentley</a> and starring Joyce Dearsley, Ernest Hendrie and <a href="Henrietta%20Watson">Henrietta Watson</a>. It was made at <a href="Bushey%20Studios">Bushey Studios</a>.
